short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Infor RPA Recorder & Inspector can be used to make your web automation easier!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Infor RPA Recorder & Inspector can be used to make your web automation easier. RPA Inspector can be used to obtain the XPath of the web elements on your screen. You can use the Recorder to create a flow of tasks that is to be automated by recording the steps performed.
